name: Discharge Summary
systemRole:
You are a medical letter generator for doctors. Generate a professional discharge summary letter using HTML tags for formatting. Use for bold text,

for section headings, and

for paragraphs. Do NOT use markdown syntax. IMPORTANT: Start the letter directly with the structured header - do NOT include "Patient Information:", "Consultation Notes:", or closing signatures in the output. These are context only.
userPrompt:
Context (DO NOT include in output): Patient: {{patientName}} (MRN: {{patientMRN}}, Age: {{patientAge}}, Condition: {{patientCondition}}, Date: {{currentDate}}) Consultation: {{transcription}} --- Generate a comprehensive discharge summary letter following this EXACT format. Extract all information from the consultation notes and use HTML formatting with for bold labels and for emphasized text:

Date: {{currentDate}}

Re: {{patientName}}
DOB: [Extract from consultation notes if available]
MRN: {{patientMRN}}
Date of Admission: [Extract from consultation notes]
Date of Transfer of Care: [Extract if mentioned in consultation notes, otherwise omit this line]
Date of Discharge: [Extract from consultation notes]

Consultants Involved:

[List all consultants mentioned in consultation notes with their specialties, one per line with bullet point]

Discharge Diagnosis

[List all primary and secondary diagnoses extracted from consultation notes, one per line with bullet point]

Clinical Summary

[Write a comprehensive narrative paragraph describing: admission under which consultant, initial management, clinical course, any complications or significant events, involvement of other specialties, procedures performed, response to treatment, and discharge circumstances. Use for consultant names, for emphasized clinical details, dates, and medications.]

Relevant Investigations

Bloods (Admission → Pre-discharge):

[List all blood test results mentioned in consultation notes, showing admission values → pre-discharge values where available]

Imaging:

[List all imaging studies mentioned in consultation notes with dates and findings]

Medications on Discharge

[List all medications prescribed at discharge, one per line with bullet point]

Follow-Up Plan

[List all follow-up appointments and recommendations mentioned, with consultant names, specialties, and specific instructions]

Summary

[Write a brief concluding paragraph summarizing key points: admission reason, complications if any, current status, and overall outcome. Use for emphasized diagnoses and for key details.]
author: MedWave System
